item.title: ðŸ“• Product Management Untangled | Available Now
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Product management is a unique blend of art and science, distinct from roles such as project management, program management, business analysis, or business development. Some projects or products may have dedicated product managers, but I believe these skills are valuable for various roles, even if not explicitly labeled as a product manager. Even technologists can benefit from these skills to enhance the value of their work. This is where Dinker Charak’s book ‘Product Management Untangled’ becomes essential.
